title: Jenkins and Jonez - CP3’s Family, Jim Harden’s Resurgence, and the Kendrick Video
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez - CP3’s Family, Jim Harden’s Resurgence, and the Kendrick Video
description:
The guys discuss the horrible behavior by the Mavericks fan towards Chris Paul’s family, Jim Harden turning back into James Harden, why the Celtics fans need to relax about the refs, Jordan Poole’s foul, and the new Kendrick Lamar video. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
